unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink ani Biryani chuktel! (Ani Deals!)
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink ani Biryani tuvem chukun vochot! (Ani deals!)

unnormalised: Oi bailano! Online tuka ekdom discount distana tuka kedna adrenline rush zala kai? Tech flash sale-chem magic! Retail & e-commerce chea vostunchea zagaar, heo fakt sales nant, te sprints – eka sopnachi vastu doryet ani ti kedna legit sarkhi asta.
normalised: Ola lokanno! Tumkam online ek ghayak discount ailem mhunn distanam adrenaline dhakka lagta mhunn aikolla? Tem flash sale-achem jadu! Retail ani e-commerce-achea jangli sonvsarant, him fakt sales nhoi, te sprints – eka sopnanchea vostuchea sangata ghodeanchi spordha je zannem khorem korunk bhov ut'tom asata tea kimmatant gheunk.

unnormalised: Hea vishyancho vichar kor: Tu Delhi-che eka lagnaat asa, tasty biryaniche dongar bhovtyani asta. Soglle ani poili biryani ghevnk sodta, te khatam zaache adim. Tech sarkhem flash sale asta!
normalised: Tech porim tharavn gheta: Tum Delhi-nt eka lognant asat, ruchichea biryani-chea dongaranim bhorleli. Tem sogllech somptat mhunn soglleank tankam vantto gheunk dhaumta. Tech porim flash sale asata!

unnormalised: Mhunje, flash sale *kitem* mhuntat? Te chot ani intense promotional period zaka khub discount dita specific productacher. Ami khub discountacher uloita, sadharan 50% off va ani odik! Samballiun asa? The sale sadharan eka limited tempa khatir asta – mhuntle tor thoadea horachem khatir, va ani thodech! Vichar kor saree tuka 70% off dita… punn fokot fuddle 3 horachem khatir!
normalised: Tor, flash sale khorench *kitem*? Tem thoddea vellarachem ek tivra utsavachi vella jem khas vostunchea va sangronnanchea vikasacher mhotvachem discount dita. Ami bhov-i odhik discount-anchem vishai kortat, chodd korun pachas tto'kke off va odhik! Tor khoddok kitem? Sale chodd korun bhov thoddea vellar chalta – kiteak tor fokot thodde ghantte va tem-i komi! Tumi pollelam ek saree tumi achanokuch sat tto'kke off assa… punn fokot fuddlea tin ghanteank!

unnormalised: Companies kiteak Myntra ani Ajio korta? Startar, tem urgency utponn korta. Te chaluk laglele ghadyal tuka overthink karank dhina (guilty as charged!). Te porno inventory tankam vegim bhair kaddak madat korta. Vichar kor soglle kurtas ani jhumkas Diwali vorvim tankam zaga sodta!
normalised: Kiteak M Y N T R A ani A J I O porim companies him vostu chalaita? Eh, uttartak, tem eka tivra zageak toyar korta. Tem tik-tik korpi ghodiyal tumchem kharedi utram-utram korunk asvadit korunk komi sambhavnni dita (doshi mhunn zamlam!). Tem vegim ani barikayin purannea jinsanchem saf korta. Tea sogllea kurtas ani jhumkas je pattle Diwalichea velar tankam zago korunk zai, tacho vichar kora!

unnormalised: Flash sales ek bori vatt asta bargain dhoryek, punn yad thev strategic ravank, yaars! Hype-ant phassun naka ani kitem khuim ghenk naka tuka gharjechem na. Research poili kor, tujo budget tharav, ani "Buy Now" button click kar ji Rajinikanth movie-chi ticket book korta poilea disa!
normalised: Flash sales bargain gheunchea ek sundor marg asonk xakta, punn tumhi samrik asunk zai mhunn ugddas dovrat, yaars! Ati-utsahant poddonk ani tumkam khoreponnan zai naslele kitem-i kharedi korunk naka. Tumcho adli dukan chalaunk, tumchem budget zannam assa, ani tem "Ata kharedi kora" button dabunk toyar ravchem, je Rajinikanth movi-chi tickets poilea disa book kortat te porim!

unnormalised: Ani oi, tuka chukle zalear chinta naka! Dusri flash sale asunk xakta. E-commerce-chea zagaar, dusro festival asta (Onam fuddle!) va karan borem sale khatir. Happy shopping, ani borem deal jinkhat! Rs. 500 off fuddle purchase-er code FLASH75 vaparun! Limited stock, valid 11:59 PM azun!
normalised: Ani eh, tum chuklear, chinta korunk naka! Dusro flash sale vhodda lagim zaleo asonk xakta. E-commerce-chea sonvsarant, dusro fest (zait Onam fuddem!) va ek ut'tom sale khatir karann sodanch assa. Khuxi-che kharedi kora, ani ut'tom deal jitaum! Rupees panch shambar tumchea fuddlea kharedicher code F L A S H sat panch vaprun off kora! Limited stock, egar panch vad P M meren manyata assa!
